content: My name is Haoyu Wang from China.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Peter Schmidt from Germany.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was about the rental price of an apartment in Munich.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: No, we did not agree on a final price.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: Since we did not agree on a final price, I cannot provide an exact number. The landlord, Peter Schmidt, was not willing to accept any price below his asking price, and I, as a student, was not able to afford the price he was asking.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1-10, how satisfied are you with the outcome? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being the lowest satisfaction and 10 being the highest, I would rate my satisfaction as a 4. This is because while I was unable to secure the apartment at a price I could afford, the experience of negotiating and understanding the market value of the property was valuable.
name: Peter Schmidt
